description: From proletarianize +â€Ž -ation (suffix indicating the result of an action or process).

nouns.description: proletarianization (countable and uncountable, plural proletarianizations) (American spelling, Oxford British English)

definitionGroups.group: The act or process of making somebody or something proletarian.

entries.meaning: (Marxism) The social process whereby people move from being either employers, unemployed, or self-employed to being employed as wage labour by employers.
